content: ***hopscotch can and bottle cozy pattern *** this pattern is available for free on my blog or purchase the ad-free printer friendly pdf for a small fee https //greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/crochet-can-cozy-pattern-hopscotch-bottle-free ✦ quick and cute can cooler and bottle cozy pattern ✦ 3 sizes included 12 oz bottle 12 oz can and 12 oz skinny can ✦ unique v-neck bottle cozy design for easy access ✦ keep your hands warm and your drink cold ✦ make your drink fun with a hopscotch beverage cozy ✦ perfect gift for guys for birthday or father s day ✦ quick pattern is great for craft sales ✦ learn to create a magic_ring extended single_crochet and crossed double_crochet with included photo tutorials and links to video tutorial --> ready for immediate download in pdf form --> this is an intermediate crochet pattern with a couple of advanced stitches --> click here to join my email newsletter and get a coupon for $2 off any pattern in my ravelry shop --> **join newsletter now ** 1 --> click here to join my vip facebook community for exclusive discounts cals giveaways and more --> **join the fb group ** 2 **what is included ** 6 page pdf pattern in us english with american crochet terms your pattern is available to download from your ravelry purchases and an email will be sent with a download link as well **sizes ** bottle 2 5 diameter x 6 long skinny can 2 5 diameter x 5 long classic can 2 75 diameter x 4 5 long **materials ** dk/light 3 yarn 100-120 yards us f/5 3 75 mm yarn needle scissors **stitch key ** slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet esc - extended single_crochet xdc - crossed double_crochet decrease - decrease by single_crochet 2 sts together esc2tog - decrease by esc 2 sts together decrease - decrease by double_crochet 2 sts together ***green fox farms designs original crochet pattern *** due to the nature of digital downloads there are no refunds for this item i am here to help if you have any questions my email and social media contacts are included with each pattern purchase as well as photo tutorials for challenging or unusual stitches you may sell items you make using this pattern if you sell them online please provide a link back to my shop this pattern is for use by the purchaser only and cannot be sold copied or used for mass production you may not use my photographs thank you lisa fox **my blog with *free* patterns tutorials & more ** www greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/ find me on etsy https //www etsy com/shop/greenfoxfarms follow me i share updates photos and occasional giveaways and sales on my social media pages come join the fun https //www instagram com/greenfoxfarms/ https //www facebook com/greenfoxfarms/ 1 https //www greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/newsletter 2 https //www facebook com/groups/greenfoxfarms
